MongoDB + Express based content management

Periodic is an enterprise content management framework built that allows for developers to efficiently manage a system of content, themes and extensions with Express and Node.js.

Traditional Content Management Frameworks are large, bloated and obtuse. Periodic is built upon a UNIX based philosophy. Keep ideas simple and compose big ideas from many smaller ones.

Creating extensions are easy and straightfoward, read more about extending Periodic with Node.js Modules in the documentation.
